posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Apologies for this, but I appear to be having a brain-freeze. I'm trying out a build in Aielund  atm and can't remember for the life of me how to perform Craft Weapon (those who know the modules will know where). I've taken the requisite points in the skill, just can't recall how to get it done.

Iirc, there's no difference from vanilla in Aielund as far as this goes. And your assistance might also help others to apply the skill.

Thanks in advance for helping the numpty.

posts.author: grizzled_dwarflord
posts.content:
You need Craft Wand feat, which means uou need to be able to cast 3rd level spells innately. Then you need a minimum of 5 ranks of craft weapon. Then you need a large bone if no bones are available.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: I am assuming that you are in early chapter 4, the only place in the Aielund Saga where crafting is relevant, iirc.  Right click on one of the small crafting components and choose Craft Weapon, then click on the larger component that you want to combine with it, which should bring up the crafting dialog.  Unless you have a good enough Craft Weapon skill for 100% chance of success, save the game first so you can have a chance to try again.

posts.content:
Okay, maybe I haven't been clear enough - for which, apologies. No feat is needed for Craft Weapons, this is simply about the application of the skill. As far as I recall, all I need are the requisite components needed for the weapon and the skill level needed to use them to make, for example, a mundane shortsword, bow, or handaxe.

As far as I know, no ore blobs are necessary.
